name: Aby's Life 🐠
description:
Aby's Life

Explore the abyss and face your past in this tiny diving simulator. Maybe you will discover friends and secrets that were forgotten from ages. 🐙🐟🐡🐠

Use arrow keys to move and your mouse to light your way

Made by Tieffeline and Menica Folden in 72h for Ludum Dare 48
